title: 148 O mewura ma me ne wo nante

slides.text: 1 O  mewura   wo  ne me  nante Ahobreaseɛ  ne  ɔsom  mu Ka   woahuntasɛm   kyerɛ  me Boa me  na  me  nsoa   ɔbra   yi  mu  brɛ .
2 Boa me  na   menfa  ‘ dɔ   asɛm  bi Ntwe   wɔn  a  w’akoma   ayɛ   duru Ma  mensɔ   akobɔfoɔ  mu Na  menkyerɛ   wɔn   efie   kwan .

148 O  MEWURA  MA ME NE WO  NANTE

1 Sɛ   ɔbra   asorɔkye   rebɔ   wo   akɔ  a Na  woaba  mu  bu Redwen   sɛ   biribi  a  ayera  a Kan   wo   nhyira   pii  no to din  nkoro   nkoro Na  deɛ   Awurade   ayɛ   ama   wo Bɛyɛ   wo   nwanwa .

4 Ɛnti   sɛ   ɔhaw   no mu  yɛ  den  sɛn   ara Nya   abotɔyam   Nyame  no a  bɛkyerɛ Kan   wo   nhyira   pii  no  na   abɔfo   bɛtie Ɛbɛma   wo   awerɛkyekye   akwantu   yi  mu.

title: 162 Mepɛ sɛ me yɛ odwuma yɛfoɔ

slides.text: 1 Me  pɛ   sɛ  me  yɛ   adwuma  ma  Awurade Me  pɛ   sɛ   metwere   n’asɛm   kronrkon  no Na  mato   nnwom   abɔ   mpae ’ Ayɛ   adwuma   dabiara ‘ Wɔ   Awurade   ahenie  mu.

2 Mɛdi   m’Agyenkwa   akyi Akɔ   bɔnhwa  no mu Deɛ   asɔrekye   rebɔ   na   ɛsum   aduru  no Sɛ  ne  nsa  di  manim   yi   merensuo   dabi Musuo   ntumi   nhuma  me  sɛ m’Agyenkwa   bɛn  me a.
3 Bɔnhwa  no  ase   anaa   mepɔ   atifi Mekra   bɛkɔ  so  abɛn   Agyenkwa  no  daa Ɔbɛgya  me  dwoodwoo   akwan  a  w’afa  so no Akɔ   deɛ   wɔhyia   Nyame   kokoɔ  so.
169  MƐDI   YESU   AKYI
Nyesoɔ Mɛdi   n’akyi ,  mɛdi   Yesu   akyi Baabiara   ɔbɛkyerɛ   mɛdi   n’akyi   daa . Mɛdi   n’akyi   mɛdi   Yesu   akyi Baabiara   ɔkyerɛ  me  mɛdi   n’akyi   akɔ .
Nyesoɔ Mɛdi   n’akyi ,  mɛdi   Yesu   akyi Baabiara   ɔbɛkyerɛ   mɛdi   n’akyi   daa . Mɛdi   n’akyi   mɛdi   Yesu   akyi Baabiara   ɔkyerɛ  me  mɛdi   n’akyi   akɔ .
Nyesoɔ Mɛdi   n’akyi ,  mɛdi   Yesu   akyi Baabiara   ɔbɛkyerɛ   mɛdi   n’akyi   daa . Mɛdi   n’akyi   mɛdi   Yesu   akyi Baabiara   ɔkyerɛ  me  mɛdi   n’akyi   akɔ .
1 Ɔdɔ  ho  asɛm   nwanwa , Siso   kyerɛ  bio Ɔdɔ  ho  asɛm   nwanwa Ɛkanyaa  me  kra  bio Abɔgo  de  anigye   ka Nwanhwɛfo   gye  no  suro  so Bɔneyɛfo   wo   nnyenni    anaa Ɔdɔ  ho  asɛm   nwanwa .

2 Ɔdɔ  ho  asɛm   nwanwa Sɛ   wo   wɔ   akyiri   mpo  a Ɔdɔ  ho  asɛm   nwanwa Ɔda  so  frɛ   wo   ɛnnɛ Ɔfrɛ  fi  Kalvary   bepɔ  no mu Fi  abura   hyɛnhyɛn  no mu Ɛfi   abɔde   ahyease   Ɔdɔ   asɛm   nwanwa
3 Ɔdɔ  ho  asɛm   nwanwa Yesu  de  ɔhome Ɔdɔ  ho  asɛm   nwanwa Ma  deɛ   wahyira   wɔn Yɛn  ne  wɔn  a  wɔadi   kan  no Bɛhome   ɔsoro  fie mu Yɛbɛto   anigye   dwon    hɔ Ɔdɔ  ho  asɛm   nwanwa
17 ƆDƆ   ANWANWASƐM
Nyesoɔ Nwanwasɛm,nwanwasɛm Nwanwasɛm   ni Ɔdɔ  ho  asɛm   nwanwa

title: 170 Metwere basa a ɛnwu da no

slides.text: 1 ‘ Yɔnkofa   bɛn   ni ,  anigye   kronkron Metwere   basa  a  ɛnwu  da no Nhyira   bɛn   ni   asomdwoe   bɛn   ni Metwere   basa  a  ɛnwu  da no.
2 Akwantu   yi   mu  nanteɛ   ayɛ   dɛ Metwere   basa  a  ɛnwu  da no. O  hwɛ   sɛ  me  kwan  no mu  hyerɛn   daa Metwere   basa  a  ɛnwu  da no.
3 Deɛn   na   ɛhuna  me,  deɛn   na   mesuro ? Metwere   basa  a  ɛnwu  da no. Me  wura   bɛn  me  yi   menya   asomndwoe Metwere   basa  a  ɛnwu  da no.

title: 171 Mɛkɔ deɛ wo pɛ sɛ mekɔ

slides.text: 1 Ɛbi  a  n’ɛnyɛ   mepɔ   atifi Anaa   ɛpo   asorɔkye  mu Ɛbi  a  n’ɛnyɛ   ɔko  bi  anim Na me  wura   hia  me Nanso   sɛ   ɔhia  me  baabiara Akwan  a  mennim   nso   mpo  a Mede me  sa   bɛto   mewura   deɛ  m’ Mɛkɔ   deɛ   wo   pɛ   sɛ   mekɔ .

2 Ɛbia   nsɛmde  bi  wɔ   hɔ   ɛnnɛ A  Yesu   pɛsɛ   meka Ɛbia   seisei   wɔ   bɔne   kwan  mu Kobɔfoɔ  bi  hia  me moa  O  Agyenkwa   sɛ   wo   kyerɛ  me  kwan Kwan no mu  yɛ  sum  sɛn   ara Me  nne   bɛgyege   wo   nsɛmdɛ  ho Mɛka   deɛ   wopɛ   sɛ   meka .

3 Ɛnyɛ   dɛn   ara   baabi   wɔ Asaase   tɛtrɛɛ   yi  so a Mɛyɛ  ‘ dwuma  me  nna   tia   yi  mu Ama   Yesu  a  ɔsɛn  no  no Ɛnti   mede   m’ade   nyinaa   hyɛ   wo   nsa Na  menim   sɛ   wo   dɔ  me Mede  anibere   bɛyɛ   wo   pɛ Mɛyɛ   deɛ   wopɛ   sɛ   meyɛ .
171 MƐKƆ   DEƐ  WO  PƐ   SƐ   MEKƆ
Nyesoɔ Mɛkɔ   deɛ   wopɛ   sɛ   mekɔ  me  wura Bepɔ  so,  pɛtɛɛm ,  ɛpo  so  anaa Mɛka   deɛ   wopɛ   sɛ   meka  , me  wura Mɛyɛ   deɛ   wopɛ   sɛ   meyɛ .
Nyesoɔ Mɛkɔ   deɛ   wopɛ   sɛ   mekɔ  me  wura Bepɔ  so,  pɛtɛɛm ,  ɛpo  so  anaa Mɛka   deɛ   wopɛ   sɛ   meka  , me  wura Mɛyɛ   deɛ   wopɛ   sɛ   meyɛ .
Nyesoɔ Mɛkɔ   deɛ   wopɛ   sɛ   mekɔ  me  wura Bepɔ  so,  pɛtɛɛm ,  ɛpo  so  anaa Mɛka   deɛ   wopɛ   sɛ   meka  , me  wura Mɛyɛ   deɛ   wopɛ   sɛ   meyɛ .
1 ‘ Wura  pa  yɛbubu   paanoo  no de  kae , Saa   afɔre   kɛsɛ  no  wɔ  Calvary Yɛ ’  yɛ   sei   Awurade  da  Kristo   n’ahyɛ Hyira   asuafoɔ  a  wɔbu   paanoo  no  seisei .
2 Hyira   kuruwa   yi  so ma  yɛn   nnɛ  ‘ wura  pa. Ma  yɛn   mfa   koma  pa  ntie   n’asɛm  no Yɛpae  no  wuo  mu  ka   sɛdeɛ   ɔpɛ Yɛdi   saa   daa   yi   kosi   sɛ   ɔbɛba .
3 Yɛ ’  Agyenkwa  no di  hene   wɔ   ɛsoro W’adi   wuo  so  nkunim   ɔdɔ   bɛn   ni ? Ɔforo   kɔ   soro   akɔdi   hene Ɔyɛ   yɛ’adamfo  pa,  ɔtuaa   yɛnka  no.
172 PAANOO  NO  BUBUO

1 Mafa   Yesu   sɛ   m’adamfo Ɔyɛ  me  biribiara Ɔda   mpemdu  mu  bafua  ma me  kra . Ɔyɛ   bɔnhwa  mu  sukooko Ne mu  nko   na   mehu Deɛ   mehia   horo  me ho  na   ama   m’adi  mu. Ɔkyekye   me  werɛ   awerɛhoɔm ’ Ɔsɔ  me mu  amaneɛm ’ Ɔse   menfa  me  dadwene   nto  no so Ɔyɛ   bɔnhwa  mu  sukooko ‘ Nɔpa   nsoromma   ɛkyerɛn Ɔda   mpemdu  mu  bafua  ma me  kra .

2 Wayi   m’awerɛhoɔ   nyinaa Wasoa  me yea  nyinaa . Wɔ   sɔhwɛ  mu  ɔyɛ  me  aban   kɛse M’agyaa   ade   nyinaa   ama  no Masɛe   m’ahoni   nyinaa Afi  me  komam   n’afei   mehyɛ  ne  tumi   ase . Sɛ   wiase   nyinaa   po  me a Na  bonsam   sɔ  me  hwɛ  a Yesu   nti   mɛduru   botae  no ho  dwoodwoo Ɔyɛ   bɔnhwa  mu  sukooko ‘ Nɔpa   nsoroma   ɛhyerɛn Ɔda   mpemdu  mu  bafua  ma me  kra .

3 Ɔ’nya  me  dabiara  da,  na   ɔnpo  me  wɔ  ha Sɛ  mete  gyidie  mu  na   meyɛ  ne  pɛ  a W’ayɛ   gya   atwa  me ho  ahyia   mensuro   bribiara Ɔde  ne manna no  kum  me  kra   kɔm  no Ɔbɛhwim  me  akɔ   soro   akɔhu   n’anim Deɛ   anigye   nsuo   sen   daa   nyinaa    Ɔyɛ   bɔnha  mu  sukooko   ɛhyerɛn   Ɔda   mpemdu  mu  bafua  ma me  kra .
173 BƆNHWA  MU  SUKOOKO
1 Nyame   abusua  ne  n’asɔre   kronkron Ɔde  ne  nyansa   n’ɛtee ,  hyɛ  ne den Dwanekɔbea  ma  mpanyin ,  mɔfra Ne mu  na   nokwasɛm  fi  kɔ .
2 Wɔn  a  wɔadi   wuo  so no  wɔ   nohoaa . Agyedifo   nso   te   ase  ha Nkurofoɔ   kuo   baanu   yi   bom   yɛ Fie  baako   awoɔ   kronkron  mu.
3 Ɛhɔ   animuonyam ,  ɛha   nhyira Anidasoɔ   koro  ‘ wurade  din mu Asafo   koro  ne  nkyerɛkyerɛ   koro N’aba   tennenee   hyira   aman   nyinaa .
174 NYAME   ASAFO
Nyesoɔ Kristo   asafo Ɔde  ne  mogya   atɔ  no  aboɔden Nyame   ahennie   hotefoɔ   tenabea Nkwa   ahenman  ma  Nyankopɔn   mma .
Nyesoɔ Kristo   asafo Ɔde  ne  mogya   atɔ  no  aboɔden Nyame   ahennie   hotefoɔ   tenabea Nkwa   ahenman  ma  Nyankopɔn   mma .
Nyesoɔ Kristo   asafo Ɔde  ne  mogya   atɔ  no  aboɔden Nyame   ahennie   hotefoɔ   tenabea Nkwa   ahenman  ma  Nyankopɔn   mma .

1 Yɛn   Nyame   yɛ   abankɛse Kyɛm  a  enni   huammɔ  da Ɔno   na   ɔyɛ   yɛn   boafoɔ Ɔbra   nsuyiri   yi  mu Yɛn   tamfo  dada no Hwehwɛ   yɛn   sɛeɛ   ara Ne  nnaadaa   tumi  so Ɔtan   ahyɛ  no ma Ne so bi  ni   asaase   yi  so.

2 Yɛn   ankasa   ahoɔden  mu no Yɛn   mmɔdenmɔ   bɛyɛ   kwa Barima  pa bi  wɔ   yɛafa Deɛ   Onyame   apa  no  no Wobisa   oniiko ? Kristo   Yesu  ne No. Asafo   Awurade Ɔnsakyera   mfesanten  mu Na  ɛtwa   sɛ   odi   nim .

3 Sɛ   bɔne   ahyɛ   wiase  ma  Repɛ   sɛ   ɛsee   yɛn  a Yɛrensuro   Nyame   ama N’asɛm   nam   yɛn  so di  nim Yɛhwere   ahode ,  abusua Na  saa   nkwa   tia ’  yi   nso Wɔbɛkum   nnipadua   yi Nyame   asɛm   te   hɔ   daa Nahenie  no  wɔ   hɔ   daa   nyinaa .
175 ABAN   KƐSE
1 Wɔama   adehyee   frankaa  no so Ma  ɔhene   asraafoɔ  no. Yɛma  so  ɛnnɛ   sɛ   nsɛnkyerɛne  bi W’atɔ   yɛn   nti   yɛto   dwom .
2 Sɛ  ‘ tamfoɔ  no  bofu   sɔre   tia   yɛn  a Mo ma  yɛn   nhim   frankaa  no Na  yɛn   nyinaa   pintiin   sɛ   Awurade   asraafoɔ Na  yɛn   sɔ   nokorɛ  no mu.
3 Asaase  so,  po  so  baabi ’ a  nnipa   te Yɛnfa  ‘ n’uonyam   nsɛm   yi   nkyerɛ Yɛnka   frankaa   kɔkɔɔ  no ho  asɛm   nkyerɛ Bere  a  Owura  no  reyi  ne  deɛ .
4 Sɛ   yɛn   sahene   kɛseɛ  no fi  ɛsoro Bɔ  ‘ wusɔre   dawuro  no a Ɔtanfo  no  bɛwu   yɛn   hene   n’anim Na  ahotefoɔ   atwam   akɔ .
176 ASƐNDUA   FRANKAA
Nyesoɔ Yɛ  ‘ bɔ   nsra   kɔ   yɛanim Kristo   nti   bu   bribiara   adehwerɛ Yɛbɛbrɛ ,  ato   dwom  ‘ma  ahene  mu  hene Asɛnnua   frankaa  no  ase .
Nyesoɔ Yɛ  ‘ bɔ   nsra   kɔ   yɛanim Kristo   nti   bu   bribiara   adehwerɛ Yɛbɛbrɛ ,  ato   dwom  ‘ma  ahene  mu  hene Asɛnnua   frankaa  no  ase .
Nyesoɔ Yɛ  ‘ bɔ   nsra   kɔ   yɛanim Kristo   nti   bu   bribiara   adehwerɛ Yɛbɛbrɛ ,  ato   dwom  ‘ma  ahene  mu  hene Asɛnnua   frankaa  no  ase .
Nyesoɔ Yɛ  ‘ bɔ   nsra   kɔ   yɛanim Kristo   nti   bu   bribiara   adehwerɛ Yɛbɛbrɛ ,  ato   dwom  ‘ma  ahene  mu  hene Asɛnnua   frankaa  no  ase .
1 Yesu   frɛ   yɛn   wɔ   bere  a Ɔbra   asorɔkye   bɔ   yɛn Ne  nne   dɛɛdɛ   gyegye   daadaa Sɛ   kristoni  di ma  kyi .
2 Tetemerɛ  mu  asomafo Tee  wɔ  Galilee  po  so n’ Wɔgyaa   abusua , ne  ne   adwuma Kɔdii   wɔn   dɔfo   n’akyi
3 Yesu   frɛ   yɛn   sɛ   mma   yɛnnsom Wiase  mu  neɛma   buhuo Ɔhwɛ   neɛma   ɛsom   yɛn   bo   ka Sɛ   Kristoni   dɔ  m’  kyɛn   eyi .
4 Anigye  ne  awerɛho  mu ‘ Dwumaden  ne  ahomegye  mu Ɔda  so  frɛ   yɛn   sɛ   yɛnnɔ No  ɛnkyɛn   ade   nyinaa .
5 Yesu   frɛ   yɛn : O  Agyenkwa Yɛserɛ  ma  yɛnte   wo   frɛ  no Yɛn   koma   nyɛ   setie  ma  wo Yɛnnɔ   wo   nkyɛn   ade   nyinaa .
177 YESU   FRƐ   YƐN
1 Ao  me  nkurofo   monhwɛ   frankaa No  renyam   wɔ   soro Afei   nkyidɔm   reyi   wɔnho Nkonim   abɛn .
2 Hwɛ   dɔm   kɛse  bi a  wɔreba Bonsam  di  wɔn   anim Akatakyie   rehwe   ase Mmarima   bo   retu .
3 Hwɛ   nkonim   frakaa  no  renyam Tie  abɛn   rehyɛn Yɛbɛdi   nim ,  yɛn   hene  din mu Atamfo   nyinaa  so.
4 Ɔko   no  akyɛ   na  emu  ayɛ  den Nso   yɛn  moa  rebɛn Yɛn   sahene   kɛse  no  reba Me  nua   nya   akomato  m’
178 MONYINA   AKO  NO
Nyesoɔ Monyina   ɔko   n’ano   na   me’eba Yesu   renyam   nsa Mo  nye  so  ase  no  soro   hɔ   sɛ Woadom   nti   yɛ   gyina .
Nyesoɔ Monyina   ɔko   n’ano   na   me’eba Yesu   renyam   nsa Mo  nye  so  ase  no  soro   hɔ   sɛ Woadom   nti   yɛ   gyina .

Nyesoɔ Monyina   ɔko   n’ano   na   me’eba Yesu   renyam   nsa Mo  nye  so  ase  no  soro   hɔ   sɛ Woadom   nti   yɛ   gyina .
1 Mɛto   megyefoɔ   dɔ   nnwanwa A  ɔwɔ  ma me no ho  ndwom Ɔhu   amane   asɛndua  so De  gyee  me fi  musuo  mu.
2 Mɛka   anwanwa   asɛm   yi Adeɛ  a  mehweree   nome   nsa  aka Ɔfi  ne  dɔ  ne  ahumɔbɔ   kɛseɛ  m’ Tuaa  me  ti   adeɛ   maa  me  kwa .
3 Mɛyi  me  gyefo   dɔfo  no  ayɛ Mɛka  ne  nkunim   tumi  ho  asɛm Ɔma  ne di,  nkunim   wɔ Bɔne ,  owuo  ne  asaman  so.
4 Mɛto   megyefoɔ   soro   dɔ A  ɔwɔ  ma me no ho  nwom Nyame   ba  no  ayi  me  afi Owuo  mu aba ne  nkyɛn .
179 ME  GYEFOƆ
Nyesoɔ O to me  gyefo  ho  nwom Ɔde  ne  mogya   tɔ  me  Ɔtɔɔ  me  fafiri  no  asɛndua  so Tuaa  me  ka   maa   medee  me ho.
Nyesoɔ O to me  gyefo  ho  nwom Ɔde  ne  mogya   tɔ  me  Ɔtɔɔ  me  fafiri  no  asɛndua  so Tuaa  me  ka   maa   medee  me ho.

1 ‘ Hɔho  bi  gyina   wo   pono   ano,ma  no  mram ’ Ɔtaa   gyina   hɔ   mpɛn   pii ,  mano   mram Ma no  mram  ,  anyɛ  a  ɔbɛkɔ Ma  ɔkronkron   ni  no  mram Yesu   Kristo   Onyame   ba  no Ma no  mram
2 Bue   wo   koma  ma no  seisei  ma no  mram Sɛ   wo   twɛn  a  ɔbɛkɔ , ma no  mram Ma no  mram ,  ɔyɛ    adamfo Ɔbetwitwa   agye   wo   kra Ɔbɛkora   wo   akɔdu   awiei Ma no  mram
3 Tie ne  dɔ   nne  no  seisei  ma no  mram   Seisei   ara   fa  no  yɛ   wo  de ma no  mram Ɔgyina   wo   pon ’  akyi Ɔbɛma   wo   anigye Na  wo   bɛtontom  ne din Ma no  mram
4 Ma  ɔsoro   hɔho  no  mram , ma no  mram ,  Ɔbɛto   ɛpono   ama   wo , ma no  mram   Ɔde   wo   bɔne   bɛkyɛ   wo   Na  sɛ   fam  ha  abusua   twa  a Ma no  mram
18 MA NO  MRA  MU
1 Sɛ   mɛyɛ   sɛ   wo  o  gyefoɔ   hyirafoɔ Ɛyi  ne me  daa  ‘ pɛ  ne  adesrɛ Mede  anigye   bɛpo   wiase   ahonya Yesu   na   mayɛ   pɛ   sɛ   wo   ara .
2 Sɛ   mɛyɛ   sɛ   wo   ayamhyehyeɛ  mu Bɔnefafiri  ne  ayamye  mu Mɛboa   onubie ,  deɛ   w’atɔ   baha Mahwehwɛ  ‘ bɔnefoɔ   akobɔfoɔ .
3 Sɛ   mɛyɛ   sɛ   wo   ahobrease  mu Mayɛ   konkron   adwo   akokoɔdurom ’ Matumi   agye   animka  bi  ara Mahu   amane   agye   ebinom .
4 Sɛ   mɛyɛ   sɛ   wo   mewura   mereba Abɛgye   abodin   kronkron  no Mede  deɛ   mewɔ   nyinaa  are  reba Awurade  ne  nyinaa   yɛ   wo   deɛ   afei .
180 O  SƐ   MƐYƐ   SƐ  WO
Nyesoɔ Sɛ   mɛyɛ   sɛ   wo ,  sɛ   mɛ   yɛ   sɛ   wo Gyefoɔ   hyirafoɔ ,  wo   ahoteɛ  mu Bra  woahoɛfɛ  mu, bra  wo   mayɛ  mu Fa   wo   suban  no  hyɛ  me  komam ’

1 Adom   nwanwa , ne  dɛ  a  ɛyɛ Ɛgyee  me  mɔborɔni Anka   na   mayera   afei   wahu  me M’anifurae   afei  me  hu   ade .
2 Adom   n’ɛkyerɛ   mekoma   suro N’adom   n’ɛyii  me  suro Berɛ  a me  yɛɛ   setie   maa   asɛm  no Adom  no  pue ’  maa   me.
3 Mefaa  ‘haw ne  amaneɛ  mu Ansa   na   meduu  ha Adom   n’ɛdee  me  duu  ha  dwoodwoo Na  ɛbɛdi   manim   akɔ  fie.
4 Awurade  de papa  ahyɛ  me  bɔ N’asɛm  ma  manidasoɔ   tim Ɔbɛyɛ  me  kyɛm  ne  kyɛfa Meda  so  te   nkwam ’  yi .
5 Sɛ   yɛtena   hɔ   mfeɛ   mpendu  a Owia   bɛka  so  ahyerɛn Yɛbɛkɔso   ayi   Nyame   ayɛ Te   sɛ   yɛhyɛɛ   ase  no.
181 ADOM   NWANWA
1 Me kea ma ne  nne  so De  naaseɛ   kɔ   soro   hɔ Kronkronyɛ  mu. Obi  nni   hɔ  a  ɔbɛtyumi Ayi   Yesu   anwanwa   dɔ   ayɛ .
2 ‘ N igye   adekyeɛm ’ ‘ somdwoe   anadwo Koomyɛ  haw mu ‘ hann   adesae  mu Aduro  yea mu, ‘ hoɔden   mereyɛ  m’ Ne  saa   Yesu   anwanwa   dɔ   yi .
3 Me  bɔne   fafiri   anidasoɔ Me  pagyafoɔ   mahweaseɛ  mu Nkwa  mu o ‘ wuo  mu o me  bribiara Ne  Yesu   anwanwa   dɔ   yi .
182 YESU   ANWANWA   DƆ
Nyesoɔ Anwanwa   dɔ   Anwanwa   dɔ Yesu   anwanwa   dɔ   yi .

1 Ka   tetesɛm  no  kyerɛ  me  Ɛsoro   ahuntasɛm Yesu  ne  n’anuonyam  ho  asɛm Yesu  ne  ne   dɔ  ho  asɛm Ka  ‘ sɛm  no  pefee   kyerɛ  me  sɛ Woreka   akyerɛ   abɔfra . Fisɛ  me  yɛ   merɛ   na   m’abrɛ Me  nni  moa  efi  aka me.

2 To  w’bo   ka  ‘ sɛm  no  kyerɛ  me Na  mentumi   nte   aseɛ Saa   Nyame   ɔgyeɛ   nwanwa  no Bɔne   ano   aduru . Si so  ka   kyerɛ  me  mpɛn   pii Fisɛ   meyare   awerɛfiri Ahanamakye   bosuo  no Awe  awiabere  mu.

3 Ka  ‘ sɛm  no  bɔkɔɔ   kyerɛ  me  Ma no  nyɛ   ahiasɛm Kae   sɛ  me ne  bɔneyɛni  a Yesu   bae   bɛgyee  no Ka  ‘ sɛm  no mere  nyinaa Sɛ   wopɛ   ampaara Ahokyerɛ  mere  biara  mu Ɛma   m’akomatɔm .

4 Ka   asɛm   koro  no  ara   kyerɛ  me  Berɛ  a  wosuro   sɛ Wiase   anuonyam   huhuo   yi Retwe   m’adwen  dodo Yiw ,  sɛ   wiase  ‘ nuonyam   yi Refa  me  kra   yi  a Ka   tetesɛm  no  kyerɛ  me. Sɛ   Kristo   bɛgyee  me.
183 KA  TETESƐM  NO  KYERƐ  ME

1 O me  Nyame ,  sɛ   mede   ahodwiri   dwene Wiase   nyinaa  a  wode   wo   nsa   ayɛ  a Mehu   nsoroma , mete  agradaa   huuhuu Wotumi  da  adi   wo   wiase   nyinaa .
2 Sɛ  me  nante   kwaeɛ  ne   mfofoo  mu a Na mete  nomaa  to  wɔn    nnwom   dɛɛdɛ Na  meto  man fi  mepɔ   atifi  a  Mete  nsuo   a  ɛworoso  ne  mframa   dɛɛdɛ .
3 Na  sɛ   medwene   sɛ   Nyame   ankame  ne  ba Na  ɔsomaa  no  maa  no  ba   bɛwui Asɛndua  so,  ɔsoaa   m’adesoa   anigyem ’ Ɔtuu   mogya ,  wui  de  yii  me  bɔne .
4 Sɛ   Kristo   ba   wɔ   osebɔ   denden  mu a, Abɛfa  me a  mɛnya   anigye   kɛse Hɔ   na   mɛkoto   ahobreaseɛ  ne  ayɛyie  m’ Na  m’ateam   sɛ  me  Nyame   wo   yɛ   kɛse .
184 WO  YƐ   KƐSE

1 Merepem   kɔ   suro   kwan  so Da  biara  me  kɔ   manim   ara Ɔkwan  no mu me  bɔ   mpae   sɛ ‘ Wurade   fa  me  si   bea  a  ɛkorɔn .
2 Mekra   nni   ɔpɛ   sɛ   ɔbɛtena Bea  akyinyi   wɔ   na   suro   bu   abam Sɛ   ɛbinom   bɛtena   bea   sei  a Me  botae   yɛ   asase  a  ɛkorɔn .
3 Sɛ   bonsam  ha me  sɛn   ara Me  pɛ   sɛ  me  boro   wiase  so Fisɛ   gyediem  mate  nnwom   bi Hotefoɔ   nnwom   bea  a  ɛkorɔn   hɔ
4 Me  pɛ   sɛ   meforo   kɔ   soro   hɔ Kɔhwɛ   animuonyam  a  ɛhyerɛm Nanso  me  bɔ   mpae   daa   sɛ ‘ Wura  di  m’ani    kɔ   bea  a  ɛkorɔn .
185 ASAASE  A  ƐKORƆN
Nyesoɔ ‘ Wurade  ma me so  mame   nfa Gyedie   ngyina  ‘ soro   asaase  so Gyinabea  a  ɛkorɔn   sen   deɛ   manya ‘ Wurade   fa  me  si   bea  a  ɛkorɔn

1 Nhyira   bosuo  bi  bɛgu   Ɛyi   yɛ   Nyame   bɔhyɛ Ahomegye   merɛ  bi  bɛba Ɛfi   soro   Agyenkwa   nkyɛn .
2 Nhyira   bosuo  bi  bɛgu Ɛbɛma   yɛn   nkanyan Nkokoɔ  so ne  abun  mu Nsuo  no  retɔ   pii .
3 Nhyira   bosuo  bi  bɛgu Ma  ɛmra   yɛn  so  Awurade Yɛ   srɛ   wo  ma  yɛn   ahodwoɔ Bra,  na  ma  wasɛm  no  mra  m’
4 Nhyira   bosuo  bi  bɛgu O ma no  ɛntɔ   ɛnnɛ   Yɛpae  mu  ka   kyerɛ   Nyame , Yɛresu   frɛ   Yesu   yi .
186 NHYIRA   BOSUO
Nyesoɔ Nhyira   bosuo ,  yɛhia   nhyira   bosuo ‘ Humɔbɔ   nsuo   tɔ   gu   yɛn  so Nanso   yɛserɛ   bosuo   yi .

1 Menam   awia  mu,  m’akwantu   yi  mu Wɔ   mmepɔ  so ne  abun  mu Yesu  aka  sɛ ,  merennya   wo  das Bɔhyɛ   kronkron  a,  ɛtim   hɔ   daa .
2 Ɛsum  a  atwa  me ho  ahyia   yi Ɛntumi   nka   m’agyenkwa  no  nhyɛ Ɔno   na   ɔyɛ   hann ,  ɛsum   nni  ne mu Mekɔso   nante  ne  nkyɛn   daa .
3 Owia   hann  no mu  medi   ahurusie Merepem  so  kɔ   soro   aban  mu Meyi   nayɛ , me  nante   anigyem Menam  ‘ wia   hann  mu,  ɔdɔ   hann  no.
187 SORO   AWIA   HANN
Nyesoɔ ‘ Soro   awia   hann , ‘ soro   awia   hann De  anuonyam   kronkron   ba  me  kra  so. Hal-le- lujah ,  meredi   ahurusie Mereyi   n’ayɛ ,  Yesu   yɛ   mede .

1 Agyenkwa   wo   dɔ   nti Wowu   maa  me Ɛmmfata   sɛ   mede Biribi   kam ’  wo Dɔm ’ me  kra   koto   wo Adi  ne  bɔhyɛ  so Na  wabɔ   afɔdeɛ Ama   w’seesei .
2 Ma me  nokorɛ   koma   A  ɛsɛ   wo  de no Na  dabiara  mu no Woahu  me  sɛ Mahyɛ   dɔ   dwuma  bi  ase Mayɛ   ayamyɛ  bi Matwe   kobɔfoɔ  bi Mede  ama   wo .
3 Deɛ   mewɔ ,  deɛ   meteɛ W’akyɛdeɛ   kwa   Dɛ  mu o yea mu o ‘ Wura   meyɛ   wo  de Na  mehu   woanim  a Me  kra  a  woagye   nyinaa  no  yi Merɛsanten   nyinaa  mu Bɛyɛ   wode .
188 MƐYƐ   BIRIBI  AMA  YESU
1 Ka  me ho ‘ wura Mentumi   nkwati   wo   ntena   ase Mentumi   nnya   wo   ntu  ‘ namɔn   biako Wo   ammoa  me a Menntumi   nsoa  ‘bra  adesoa   yi Mehia   sɛ  me  twere   wo   ahoɔden .
2 Ka  me ho ‘ wura Na  sɛ   amaneɛ   bɛn  a Na  sɔhwɛ   ahum   tu   fa  me  tiri  so a Anaa   nsuo   yiri   twa  me ho  hyia   mpo  a Hwee   rennyɛ  me,  na   mekoma   mmɔ   hu .
3 Ka  me ho ‘ wura Akyɛdeɛ   anaa   nhyira  bi Ɛnntumi   nkyɛn   deɛ   wode   ama  me  yi Na  menim   sɛ   wo   ka  me ho  daa   nyinaa Metenka   baabi ’ a me  wɔ   sɛ   wobɛn .
4 Ka  me ho ‘ wura Sɛ   menni  obi  mpo  a Sɛ   ɛba   sɛ  me  su   wɔ  yea mu a Na me  merɛ  a  mɛfi   asaase   yi  so du a O  mesrɛ   sɛ   Awurade ,  ka  me ho.
189 KA ME HO  AWURADE
1 Ɔkyerɛ  me  kwan   anigyesɛm O   nsɛm  a  soro   dɛ   wɔ  mu  Nea   meyɛ  mu  baabi  a  mekɔ   Nyame   nsa  da so  kyerɛ  me  kwan
2 Tɔ  da bi a sum  kabii  mu Tɔ  da bi a Eden  nhwiren  mu Nsu   tɛɛ   dinn   ahum   tu  o Ne  nsa  da so  kyerɛ  me  kwan
3 Me  wura ,  mɛsɔ   wo   nsa  no mu Na  merennwiinwii ,  mmɔ   abubuo Mɛyɛ   komm   ade   nyinaa  mu Fisɛ   Nyame   nsa   kyerɛ  m  kwan
4 Sɛ   mewie   me  fam  ha  aduwma   Sɛ   w’adom    nti    medi   nkunim Owu   nsam   mpo ,  merɛnsuro Yordan  mu  Nyame   kyerɛ  me  kwan

1 M’asi   mebo   sɛ   merenkyinkyin  bio Wiase   anigye  twee me. Neɛma  a  ɛkorɔn ,  neɛma  ‘ ɛdi  mu Na  afei   ɛdɔ  me  kɔn .
2 M’asi   mebo   sɛ   mɛkɔ   Agyenkwa   hɔ Meregyae  me  bɔne   yi Ɔne   nokorɛ  no,  na   ɔyɛ   tenenee Ɔwɔ   nkwansɛm  no.
3 M’asi   mebo   sɛ   mɛdi   Agyenkwa   akyi Dabi ’ a  mɛdi   nokorɛ Mɛtie   deɛ   ɔka ,  mɛyɛ   deɛ   ɔpɛ Ɔne   nkwa   kwan  no
4 M’asi   mebo   sɛ   mɛkɔ   ahenie  n’ mu Mɛgyae   bɔne   akwan  no Namfoɔ   bɛpo  me, ‘ tamfoɔ   bɛba  m’ so Mɛwura  mu  ara .
5 M’asi   mebo ,  hwan   na   ɔne  me  bɛkɔ Monntwɛn   namfoɔ   momra Twerɛ  no  kyerɛkyerɛ   yɛn ,  Honhom  di  yɛanim . Yɛbɛtu   soro   kwan  no.
190 M’ASI   MEBO

1 Yɛrepemso   kɔ   daa   nkwa  mu Yɛn   anim   nko   na   yɛdi   nkunim   kɔ Dabiara   yɛ   kɔ   ko  mu Yɛreko  ma  tenenee Ɔhene   tumfoɔ  no  mara   ase Yɛde   ahosɛpɛ  to  dwom   yi   n’ayɛ Yɛ ’ ne no  bɛtena   daadaa Sɛ   yɛ  di  nkunim  a.

2 Yɛ ’ ne  yɛn   wura   bɔ   nsra   dabiara Yɛretu   kwan  ‘ kɔ   ɔdɔ  man mu Yɛrekɔ  fie,  yɛrenkyin  bio Mfi   Yesu   dɔ  ho Anigyesɛm ,  yɛ  ne no  nante Hann  a  ɛhyerɛn   wɔ  Bethlehem no  ni Yɛde   anigye   nnwom   bɔ   nsra  no Rekɔ   ɔsoro  fie.

3 Ɔbɔne   kobɔfoɔ   bɛdom   yɛn Ma  yɛn   nko  ma  Yesu  ne  tenenee Ɔrefrɛ   wo ,  ansa   na   anadwo  aba. Bɛdɔm   anigye   kuo  n’ Ɔbɛyi   wo  ho  bɔne  ne fi Ɛyi   nti   na   ɔsoaa   asendua  no Sɛ   wopɛ  a  ɔde   ɔdɔ Nwom   bɛhyɛ   wo   komamu .
191 YƐREPEMSO   KƆ

Nyesoɔ Yɛrepemso   kwan  no mu,  kɔ   bea  a  bɔne   nni   hɔ Pemso   kwan  no mu,  bea  a  bɔne   nni . Twere  no  daa   ahobrɛaseɛm Twere  no da  biara Yɛdi   nim  ne  tumi   kɛsemu Tumi   m’yɛdi   nim . slides.text: 1 Howhini   wo  da  kyinkyin Wayera   afi   Nyame   nnwan  mu Ɛnti   wo   nte  ne  frɛ   yi Yɛ   ahoboa   hyia   wo   Nyame
2 Adɛn   na   wonni   botae   bi’aa Bere  a  wo   nkwanna   retwan Na  wote   ahuhubra  mu Yɛ   ahoboa   hyia   wo   Nyame

4 Sɛ   wo   po   nsa   tofrɛ   yi Na  woma   Honhom  no  kɔ  a  Wo   bɛhu   wo   mɔborɔ   tebea Sɛ   wontumi   nhyia    Nyame
192 SIESIE  WO HO  HYIA  WO  NYAME
Nyesoɔ Howhini  tie  kɔkɔbɔ   yi Ɛfi   sɛ   wo   nkwan   retwan ’ Ɛyɛ   ya   sɛ   w’bɛhyia   Nyame   Ɛyɛ   ya   sɛ   w’bɛhyia   Nyame A  wo   nyɛɛ   ahoboa   bi’aa .

1 Wɔ   Nyame  y’  Agyenkwa   dɔ  m’ Bribi  ‘a  bɛ   yɛ   yie N’adɔeɛ   nsesa ,  ɔde   kyɛ Ne  nyinaa   yɛ . Mogya  a ‘ som   bo   sa   yɛn   yadeɛ Adom  a ‘ yɛ   pɛ   afrɛ   yɛn Nsa  a ‘ yɛ  den  bɔ   yɛn  ho ban Ɛsɛ   sɛ   ɛyɛ   yie .

2 Sɛ   yɛ   fa   amanahunu  mu  mpo  a Bribi ’ a  bɛ   yɛ   yie Yɛ   wɔ   nkwagye  a  ɛyɛ   pɛ Ne  nyinaa   yɛ Yɛ ’  anigye   sɛ   yɛtwere   Nyame  a Yɛ  so aba  yɛ   tena   Kristo  mu a Honhom  no di  yɛ   anim   kɔ   ahoteɛm ’ ‘ Sɛ   sɛ   ɛyɛ   yie .

slides.text: 1 Ka   Yesu   hgo   asɛm   kyerɛ  me  Twerɛ  ne  nyinaa   m’akoma Asɛm  a  ɛsom   bo   sei   yi   Ɛyɛ   dɛ   kyɛn   nsɛm   nyinaa Ka   sɛdeɛ   abɔfoɔ  de  nne   korɔ Too  ndwom  da  hyia   n’awoɔ Anuoyam   nka   sorosoro   Nyame ‘ Somdwee ,  nsɛmpa  aba  asae  so.

title: 99 HWEE NNI HO SE YESU MOGYA

slides.text: 1 Deɛn   na   ɛbɛhoro   me  bɔne ? Hwee   nni   hɔ   sɛ   Yesu   mogya Deɛn   bɛma  m;’  adi  mu bio? Hwee   nni   hɔ   sɛ   Yesu   mogya .
